verses.roman:
aṅgadaś citraketuś ca
lakṣmaṇasyātmajau smṛtau
takṣaḥ puṣkala ity āstāṁ
bharatasya mahīpate

synonyms: aṅgadaḥ—Aṅgada; citraketuḥ—Citraketu; ca—also; lakṣmaṇasya—of Lord Lakṣmaṇa; ātmajau—two sons; smṛtau—were said to be; takṣaḥ—Takṣa; puṣkalaḥ—Puṣkala; iti—thus; āstām—were; bharatasya—of Lord Bharata; mahīpate—O King Parīkṣit.
translation: O Mahārāja Parīkṣit, Lord Lakṣmaṇa had two sons, named Aṅgada and Citraketu, and Lord Bharata also had two sons, named Takṣa and Puṣkala.
